Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

entry.title: Forums Outage
entry.content:
Jul 23, 12:09 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 23, 12:01 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with the Hypixel Forums/Website being unaccessible.

entry.title: Public API Endpoints Disabled
entry.content:
Jul 16, 20:29 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 16, 15:03 EDT
Identified - We are investigating issues with an internal service and have disabled the following endpoints on the Public API:

- /skyblock/auctions
- /skyblock/auctions_ended
- /skyblock/bazaar

We do not currently have an ETA for when they will be re-enabled.

Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 14, 15:18 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 14, 15:00 EDT
Scheduled - SkyBlock will be undergoing maintenance for the release of 0.12.

entry.title: Forums and Web Services Maintenance
entry.content:
Jul 1, 10:14 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 1, 10:08 EDT
Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items.

Jul 1, 10:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 30, 19:44 EDT
Scheduled - The Hypixel Forums, and other web based services will have potential maintenance with some downtime as we update some backend configurations.

entry.title: Emergency Maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 24, 18:24 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 22, 19:27 EDT
Monitoring - The Hypixel Server is now open to all players.

Jun 22, 12:35 EDT
Update - The Hypixel Server is now open in a limited maintenance mode, which allows ranked players to join.

More info > https://hypixel.net

Jun 20, 13:46 EDT
Update - We have the new hardware configured, but we still need more time for set up and for our external partners to do what they need to do. But you can read more about it on the website > https://hypixel.net/

Jun 19, 11:44 EDT
Update - A progress bar has been added to the website to show how much more needs to be done before we can get up and running again. Additionally, we posted an update regarding what's going on with the maintenance, so be sure to check it out > https://hypixel.net/

If you are having trouble seeing this new update, make sure to press CTRL and F5 at the same time while on the page to refresh the cache.

Jun 17, 20:33 EDT
Update - The Hypixel Network will be down for emergency maintenance starting now. We are sorry for any inconvenience and thank you for being patient with us. You can read more at https://hypixel.net

Jun 16, 19:31 EDT
Update - We are continuing to work with our upstream provider to resolve this. We have resolved the issue of some players being unable to connect.

We appreciate your patience and support as we work to resolve these issues.

Jun 16, 18:38 EDT
Update - We are continuing to work with our upstream provider to implement a way to fully resolve this issue. We are also aware of some players being unable to connect completely at this time.

We appreciate your patience and support as we work to resolve these issues.

Jun 16, 07:30 EDT
Identified - We are aware of the issue still existing and are working on a larger solution with our provider. This may take some time and we'll keep this incident updated.

Jun 15, 21:55 EDT
Monitoring - Upstream has implemented a change and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 15, 20:37 EDT
Identified - We are aware of the connection issues occurring again and are working with our upstream provider.

Jun 15, 19:38 EDT
Monitoring - Upstream has implemented a change and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 15, 15:33 EDT
Update - We are continuing to work with the upstream provider to resolve the issues as soon as possible

Jun 15, 15:03 EDT
Identified - We have identified the issue with an upstream provider and are working with them to resolve it as soon as possible.

Jun 15, 15:00 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with intermittent connection issues to the Minecraft Server and Forums.

entry.title: Intermittent connection issues
entry.content:
Jun 14, 21:46 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 14, 21:06 EDT
Monitoring - The connection issues seem to be resolved and we are monitoring.

Jun 14, 19:47 EDT
Identified - We have identified the issue with an upstream provider and are working with them to resolve it as soon as possible.

Jun 14, 19:27 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with intermittent connection issues to the Minecraft Server and Forums.

entry.title: Support Outage
entry.content:
May 17, 09:20 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 17, 05:35 EDT
Update - We are aware of an issue causing the Hypixel Support site to be unavailable. We are in contact with the upstream provider to resolve this as soon as possible.

In the meantime, users can email support@hypixel.net directly.

May 17, 02:40 EDT
Identified - We are aware of an issue causing the Hypixel Support site to be unavailable and are working to resolve as soon as possible.

entry.title: Forums Degraded Performance
entry.content:
Mar 5, 06:23 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 5, 04:42 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified. The Hypixel Forums will be unavailable until this issue is resolved. You may submit bug reports and appeals at a later time. Thank you for your patience!

Mar 4, 23:04 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue. You will be unable to create threads or submit replies to threads in some sub-forums, such as the Server Bug Reports and Punishment Appeals forums.

entry.title: Forums Maintenance
entry.content:
Mar 2, 11:24 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Please note that due to unexpected complications with our new external storage system, we will be running another maintenance in the coming days.

Mar 1, 13:01 EST
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still underway. We are currently finalizing the file transfer while upgrading the backend server hardware and forum software.

Mar 1, 04:57 EST
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress as we move existing data to the new system. Please note that this Forums maintenance will last longer than originally expected. Thank you for your patience!

Feb 28, 19:00 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 26, 15:57 EST
Scheduled - The Hypixel Forums will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time to upgrade the backend storage system.

Please note that the maintenance may last significantly longer than specified. Both the Hypixel Support and Hypixel Store websites will be unaffected and available as usual.
